categoryListLayout.externalId.description: Select a layout for the subcategories you place in this category.To create new layouts, go to <_TABNAME=LIST_STOREITEMLISTLAYOUT_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=LIST_STOREITEMLISTLAYOUT_> > Web Site Item/Category Layouts > New.
categoryListLayout.externalId.name: categoryListLayout.externalId

description.description: Enter a brief description for this category. You can enter text, numbers and basic HTML. This field holds 999 characters.
description.name: description

excludeFromSitemap.description: Check this box to exclude a tab, category or item page from the sitemap.
excludeFromSitemap.name: excludeFromSitemap

isInactive.description: This field is false by default.
isInactive.name: isInactive

isOnline.description: Set to true to make this item available online in your Web site. You cannot sell this item online unless this field is set to true.
isOnline.name: isOnline

itemListLayout.externalId.description: Select a layout for the items you place in this category.To select a layout or create new layouts, go to <_TABNAME=LIST_SITEITEMTEMPLAT_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=LIST_SITEITEMTEMPLAT_> > Item/Category Templates.
itemListLayout.externalId.name: itemListLayout.externalId

itemListLayout.internalId.description: Select a layout for the items you place in this category.To select a layout or create new layouts, go to <_TABNAME=LIST_SITEITEMTEMPLAT_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=LIST_SITEITEMTEMPLAT_> > Item/Category Templates.

itemListLayout.name.description: Select a layout for the items you place in this category.To select a layout or create new layouts, go to <_TABNAME=LIST_SITEITEMTEMPLAT_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=LIST_SITEITEMTEMPLAT_> > Item/Category Templates.
itemListLayout.name.name: itemListLayout.name

metaTagHtml.description: Enter the Meta Tag HTML you want to appear in the  section of this item page. Meta tags enable your Web site to be found by search engines.
metaTagHtml.name: metaTagHtml

pageTitle.description: Enter the text you want to appear as the page title of the browser window.
pageTitle.name: pageTitle

relatedItemsListLayout.externalId.description: Select the list layout you want to use to display your lists of related items on this category.Set up list layouts at <_TABNAME=LIST_SITEITEMTEMPLAT_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=LIST_SITEITEMTEMPLAT_> > Item/Category Templates.Set up related items at <_TABNAME=LIST_RELATEDITEMS_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=LIST_RELATEDITEMS_> > Related Item Groups.
relatedItemsListLayout.externalId.displayName: Related Items List Layout - External id
relatedItemsListLayout.externalId.name: relatedItemsListLayout.externalId

relatedItemsListLayout.internalId.description: Select the list layout you want to use to display your lists of related items on this category.Set up list layouts at <_TABNAME=LIST_SITEITEMTEMPLAT_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=LIST_SITEITEMTEMPLAT_> > Item/Category Templates.Set up related items at <_TABNAME=LIST_RELATEDITEMS_> > <_TASKCATEGORY=LIST_RELATEDITEMS_> > Related Item Groups.
relatedItemsListLayout.internalId.displayName: Related Items List Layout - Internal id

relatedItemsListLayout.name.name: relatedItemsListLayout.name

searchKeywords.description: Enter alternate search keywords that customers might use to find this item using your web store global search. These can include synonyms, acronyms, alternate languages or misspellings. These keywords are considered equally as important as the item name when searches are conducted.
searchKeywords.name: searchKeywords

sitemapPriority.value.description: Select a value in the Sitemap Priority list to designate the relative importance of this page to the rest of your Web site's URLs. You can select a priority ranging from 0.0 to 1.0 on item, category, and tab records.Note that NetSuite assigns the default priority “Auto” to all new and existing tab, category and item records in your account. You can select a different value in the Sitemap Priority list to override the default “Auto” priority. NetSuite uses the value you set when you generate the sitemap.
sitemapPriority.value.name: sitemapPriority.value

storeDetailedDescription.description: Sets the detailed item description. This field can contain plain text as well as basic html code.
storeDetailedDescription.name: storeDetailedDescription

storeDisplayImage.externalId.description: References an existing image file in the file cabinet.In order to retrieve a list of available values for this field, use the GetSelectValue operation.

urlComponent.description: Enter a short, descriptive name for this category to appear as part of its URL in the Web store.Setting a name to show in the URL can result in better ranking from search engines.If you leave this field blank, NetSuite terms and numbers are used as identifiers in the URL.
urlComponent.name: urlComponent
